Angen melin lifio Mae angen rhiw fath o felin lifio i dorri logiau i fewn i estyll pren amlbwrpas.

Adeiladwch MELIN LIFIO LLAW neu MELIN LIFIO TRYDANOL.
Hwyliau gwael Mae'r gwladychwyr mewn hwyliau gwael a gall achosi chwalfa meddyliol bach ar unrhyw bryd:

{0}
Hwyliau ofnadwy Mae'r gwladychwyr mewn hwyliau ofnadwy a gall arwain at chwalfa meddyliol caled - a hyd yn oed fod yn dreisgar:

{0}
Gwiriwch tab Anghenion y gwladychwyr hyn i weld beth sy'n eu poeni.
Gwladychwr angen ei arbed Gwladychwyr angen eu arbed Mae'r gwladychwyr hyn yn analleuog ar y llawr:

{0}
Gyrwch gwladychwr arall i'w arbed a'i gario nhw nol i'w gwleyau.

(I'w achub, dewiswch gwladychwr arall, cliciwch y botwm dde a dewiswch Arbed.
Adeiladu ystafell Mae ystafell yn cynnwys darnau wal ar wahân gyda drws.

Dewiswch y ddewislen Pensaer ar waelod chwith y sgrin er mwyn ddynodi ble rydych am adeiladu. Unwaith y byddwch yn dynodi rhywbeth i gael ei hadeiladu, bydd eich gwladychwyr yn gwneud y gwaith pan y gallan.
Angen amddiffynfeydd Rydych chi wedi bod yma peth amser ac wedi cael eich gweld yn ôl pob tebyg. Bydd cyrchoedd môr-ladron yn dechrau cyn bo hir.

Dylech baratoi amddiffynfeydd, boed yn drapiau, bagiau tywod, neu tyredau.
Angen meddyg Mae'r gwladychwyr hyn angen gofal meddygol, ond nid oes gennych unrhyw wladychwyr iach wedi'w aseinio fel meddyg.

{0}
Aseiniwch wladychwr iach i'r weithra Meddyg. Os na chaiff ei drin, gall clwyfau byth eu wella'n iawn a allai'n y pendraw fod yn barhaol.
Angen mwynwr Yr ydych wedi dynodi creigiau i'w cloddio ond does dim gwladychwr wedi'w aseinio i'r weithra Mwynwr.

Aseiniwch wladychwr i'r weithra Mwynwr.
Angen warden Mae gennych garcharor, ond dim wladychwr wedi'w aseinio i'r weithra Warden.

Aseiniwch wladychwr i'r weithra Warden.
Bwyd isel Oes gennych ond {0} unedau o fwyd ar ôl yn eich storfa. Mae hyn yn beryglus o isel.

Tyfwch, prynwch, dod o hyd, neu lladd er mwyn cael bwyd.
Meddygaeth isel Oes gennych ond {0} meddyginiaethau ar ôl yn eich storfa.

Prynwch fwy o feddyginiaeth gan fasnachwyr.
Does dim meddyginiaeth ar ôl yn eich storfa.

Prynwch fwy o feddyginiaeth gan fasnachwyr.
Angen gwelyau gwladychwyr Mae mwy o wladychwyr yma na sydd o welyau ar eu gyfer. Bydd dim lle i gysgu i rhiwun.

Naill ai gwnewch mwy o welyau, neu newidiwch wely garcharor i wely gwladychwr. 

Os nad oes gennych adnoddau, mae mannau cysgu am ddim a gellir eu gosod ar unwaith.

Hunter lacks weapon A colonist is assigned as a hunter but has no weapon. They will not hunt until they are carrying a weapon.

To reduce injury, we recommend giving them a ranged weapon.
Starvation These colonists are starving:

{0}
Get them some food.
Animal starvation These colony animals are starving:

{0}
Get them some food.
Exhaustion These colonists are exhausted and need rest:

{0}
Get them some rest. They'll need a bed marked for colonist use. Also, make sure they're not drafted.
Need food hopper You have a nutrient dispenser with no hopper next to it.

To work, paste dispensers must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with raw food.

Build a hopper adjacent to the dispenser.
Building needs power Buildings need power These power-using buildings are totally disconnected from all possible power sources:

{0}
Connect them to a power generator or battery.
and more
Need meal source You have no way of preparing proper meals from raw food.

Build a stove, campfire, or nutrient dispenser.

(It cannot be in a prison cell, otherwise colonists cannot use it.)
Need home area You need to define a HOME AREA where your colonists will clean, extinguish fires, and repair things.

Define a home area using the ZONES section of the ARCHITECT menu.
Need batteries You only have solar generators and no batteries. This means you'll lose power every time the sun goes down.

Build a battery or two to get you through the night.
No trading capacity You have no way of trading with passing ships.

Build a comms console.
Brawler has ranged weapon One of your colonists has the Brawler personality trait, but is carrying a ranged weapon. This will make them very unhappy.
Shield user has ranged weapon One of your colonists has a personal shield and is carrying a ranged weapon. They will not be able to fire their weapon through the shield (except at targets who are already touching them).
Need research project You have the equipment to do research but have not selected a project.

Open the research menu and select a project.
Need dump You have marked {0} to be hauled, but the colonists have nowhere to take it.

Designate a stockpile and set its storage settings to accept {0}.
{0} colonists idle These colonists are wandering idly:

{0}
You should probably find them something productive to do.
Colonist needs treatment These colonists need medical treatment. Without it, they may die of their wounds, or their wounds may become permanent.

{0}
Treat them by sending them to a medical bed.

(First, assign a medical bed by selecting it and toggling it into a medical bed. Then, select the wounded colonists and right-click on the medical bed to make them a patient.)
Hypothermia These colonists are suffering from hypothermia.

{0}
Make sure their clothing is appropriate for the season and that indoor spaces are properly heated.
{0} patients await medical operation These patients await medical operation:

{0}
Make sure you have all necessary medical tools and a free doctor available.
Fire! There is a fire in the home area.
Severe illness People are at risk of death because of severe illness:

{0}
Make sure that they get the best medical possible. People are at risk for death because of severe illness:

{0}
If possible, consider amputating or replacing infected limbs in order to keep colonists alive.
Billiards needs space One of your billiards table is adjacent to an obstruction that will prevent colonists from using it.

A billiards table needs clear space around it on all sides to be usable.
Hunter has shield and ranged weapon One of your hunters is using a ranged weapon and wearing a personal shield which prevents shooting at range.

They won't be able to hunt unless the shield is removed.
Need warm clothes At least {0} of your colonists will lack warm clothes when the cold season comes. All of your colonists will lack warm clothes when the cold season comes. The outdoor temperature is going to reach {0}.

You can tailor warm clothes at the tailoring bench, or buy them from traders.
Immobile caravan One of your caravans is immobile because it carries too much.

You can make the caravan mobile again by abandoning some items in the ITEMS tab.
